name: Therapion
overview:
This company provides online therapy, counseling and coaching services.

You can search your therapist according to your language. The profiles of the therapists are clearly presented, as well as their areas of knowledge.

It provides a wide range of channels for therapy (e-mail, chat, videocam, phone) and allows the client to see the price for each service. Offers free initial consultation

The web makes e-therapy easy and accesible to your needs.
